name: menu-access-control-demo
description: Full-stack Azure application with OpenFGA authorization

scripts.dev: concurrently -n container,frontend -c blue,green "npm run container" "npm run frontend"
scripts.dev:native: concurrently -n openfga,backend,frontend -c blue,yellow,green "npm run openfga" "npm run backend" "npm run frontend"
scripts.dev:watch: concurrently -n openfga,backend,frontend -c blue,yellow,green "npm run openfga" "npm run backend:watch" "npm run frontend"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install
